title: Zero Trust Gateway Rules
description: Secure Web Gateway rules are a set of expressions(conditions) that evaluate at various phases of your internet traffic, to determine if a specific action has to be performed. These expressions can be evaluated to a true/false value and based on the evaluation result, an associated action, like whether to reject the request, or allow it, or override it, or browser isolate it is applied.

links.title: List Zero Trust Gateway Rules
links.description: List Zero Trust Gateway Rules for an account

links.title: Zero Trust Gateway Rule Details
links.description: Fetch a single Zero Trust Gateway Rule

links.title: Create Zero Trust Gateway Rule
links.description: Create a new Zero Trust Gateway Rule
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/gateway/rules" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"block bad websites","description":"Block the bad websites based on host name","action":"allow","filters":"[\"http\"]","enabled":true,"precedence":1,"traffic":"http.request.host == \"example.com\"","identity":"any(identity.groups.name[*] in {\"finance\"})","device_posture":"any(device_posture.checks.passed[*] in {\"1308749e-fcfb-4ebc-b051-fe022b632644\"})","rule_settings":{"block_page_enabled":"true","block_reason":"This website is a security risk","override_host":"example.com","override_ips":"[1.1.1.1, 2.2.2.2]","l4override":{"ip":"1.1.1.1","port":"80"},"add_headers":{"X-Custom-Header-Name":["somecustomvalue"],"My-Next-Header":["foo","bar"]},"ip_categories":true,"biso_admin_controls":{"dp":false,"dcp":false,"dd":false,"du":false,"dk":false},"check_session":{"enforce":true,"duration":"300s"},"insecure_disable_dnssec_validation":false}}'

description.example: "Block the bad websites based on host name"

action.description: The action to preform when the associated traffic, identity, and device posture expressions are either absent or evaluate to 'true'

filters.description: The protocol or layer to evaluate the traffic, identity, and device posture expressions

items.description: The protocol or layer to use

enabled.description: Set if the rule is enabled

precedence.description: Precedence sets the ordering of the rules. Lower values indicate higher precedence. At each processing phase, applicable rules are evaluated in ascending order of this value.

traffic.description: The wirefilter expression to be used for traffic matching

identity.description: The wirefilter expression to be used for identity matching

device_posture.description: The wirefilter expression to be used for device posture check matching

block_reason.description: The text describing why this block occurred that will be displayed on the custom block page (if enabled)

override_host.description: Override matching DNS queries with this

override_ips.description: Override matching DNS queries with this

port.description: A port number to use for TCP/UDP overrides

l4override.description: Send matching traffic to the supplied destination IP address and port.

add_headers.description: Add custom headers to allowed requests, in the form of key-value pairs. Keys are header names, pointing to an array with its header value(s).

ip_categories.description: Include IPs in DNS resolver category blocks. By default categories only block on domain names.

enforce.description: Enable session enforcement for this fule

duration.description: Configure how fresh the session needs to be to be considered valid

insecure_disable_dnssec_validation.description: INSECURE - disable DNSSEC validation (for allow actions)

rule_settings.description: Additional settings that modify the rule's action

links.title: Update Zero Trust Gateway Rule
links.description: Update a configured Zero Trust Gateway Rule
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/gateway/rules/f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"block bad websites","description":"Block the bad websites based on host name","action":"allow","filters":"[\"http\"]","enabled":true,"precedence":1,"traffic":"http.request.host == \"example.com\"","identity":"any(identity.groups.name[*] in {\"finance\"})","device_posture":"any(device_posture.checks.passed[*] in {\"1308749e-fcfb-4ebc-b051-fe022b632644\"})","rule_settings":{"block_page_enabled":"true","block_reason":"This website is a security risk","override_host":"example.com","override_ips":"[1.1.1.1, 2.2.2.2]","l4override":{"ip":"1.1.1.1","port":"80"},"add_headers":{"X-Custom-Header-Name":["somecustomvalue"],"My-Next-Header":["foo","bar"]},"ip_categories":true,"biso_admin_controls":{"dp":false,"dcp":false,"dd":false,"du":false,"dk":false},"check_session":{"enforce":true,"duration":"300s"},"insecure_disable_dnssec_validation":false}}'

object_definition.example:
{
  "id": "f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415",
  "name": "block bad websites",
  "description": "Block the bad websites based on host name",
  "precedence": 1,
  "enabled": true,
  "action": "allow",
  "filters": "[\"http\"]",
  "traffic": "http.request.host == \"example.com\"",
  "identity": "any(identity.groups.name[*] in {\"finance\"})",
  "device_posture": "any(device_posture.checks.passed[*] in {\"1308749e-fcfb-4ebc-b051-fe022b632644\"})",
  "rule_settings": {
    "block_page_enabled": "true",
    "block_reason": "This website is a security risk",
    "override_host": "example.com",
    "override_ips": "[1.1.1.1, 2.2.2.2]",
    "l4override": {
      "ip": "1.1.1.1",
      "port": "80"
    },
    "add_headers": {
      "X-Custom-Header-Name": [
        "somecustomvalue"
      ],
      "My-Next-Header": [
        "foo",
        "bar"
      ]
    },
    "ip_categories": true,
    "biso_admin_controls": {
      "dp": false,
      "dcp": false,
      "dd": false,
      "du": false,
      "dk": false
    },
    "check_session": {
      "enforce": true,
      "duration": "300s"
    },
    "insecure_disable_dnssec_validation": false
  },
  "created_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "updated_at": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "deleted_at": null
}
object_definition.title: Zero Trust Gateway Rules
object_definition.description: Secure Web Gateway rules are a set of expressions(conditions) that evaluate at various phases of your internet traffic, to determine if a specific action has to be performed. These expressions can be evaluated to a true/false value and based on the evaluation result, an associated action, like whether to reject the request, or allow it, or override it, or browser isolate it is applied.
